airtable._comment.token: optional access token (fallback to AIRTABLE_TOKEN env)
airtable._comment.token_path: optional token path (fallback to AIRTABLE_TOKEN_PATH env)

github._comment: mapping from github field to airtable field
github._comment.token: optional access token (fallback to GITHUB_TOKEN env)
github._comment.token_path: optional token path (fallback to GITHUB_TOKEN_PATH env)
